text: Falsoserixia is a genus of longhorn beetles of the subfamily Lamiinae,Biolib.cz - Falsoserixia. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. containing the following species: * Falsoserixia fouqueti Pic, 1933 * Falsoserixia longior Pic, 1928 * Falsoserixia rubrithorax Pic, 1927 * Falsoserixia unicolor Pic, 1926 ==References== Category:Desmiphorini
title: Falsoserixia
